entry.title: Monday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 7.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Wind southwest 40 km/h gusting to 60 becoming light this evening. Low minus 7. Wind chill minus 12 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MDT Monday 17 April 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Mainly cloudy. High 8.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Becoming cloudy near noon. Periods of snow near the British Columbia border late in the afternoon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High 8. Wind chill minus 12 in the morning. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MDT Monday 17 April 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Cloudy. Low minus 1.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Periods of snow near the British Columbia border. Amount 2 cm near the British Columbia border. Wind becoming west 40 km/h gusting to 60 near midnight. Low minus 1. Wind chill minus 9 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MDT Monday 17 April 2023
